sect1.title: Description
sect1.para: This module provides a wrapper code for performing the superquadric modeling and grasping demo. A tutorial on how to use the module is provided here: tutorial.
This page illustrates the main parameters of the module (Section Parameters), the available ports and services.

listitem.para: from: Configuration file name.
objname: The name of the object to be modeled and grasped.
hand_for_computing: Select the hand for which we want to compute a grasping pose. Available values: right, left, both.
hand_for_moving: Select the hand for which we want to use for executing the grasping. Available values: right, left.
choose_hand: Select automatically the best hand for grasping the object. Available values: true, false.
filtered: Filter multiple superquadrics in order to improve the object model. Available values: on, off.
n_pc: Number of point clouds used for averaging the superquadrics.
/superquadric-grasp-demo/img:i [yarp::sig::ImageOfPixelRgb] [default carrier:tcp]: Receive the image from the left camera for saving the colored point cloud.
/superquadric-grasp-demo/rpc [rpc-server]: service port . This service is described in graspDemo_IDL (idl.thrift)
/superquadric-grasp-demo/blob:rpc [rpc-client]:
Ask for the 2D blob of the object.
. This service is described in yarp::os::Bottle ()
/superquadric-grasp-demo/OPC:rpc [rpc-client]:
Ask for the 2D bounding box of the object.
. This service is described in yarp::os::Bottle ()
/superquadric-grasp-demo/SFM:rpc [rpc-client]:
Ask for the 3D point cloud of the object.
. This service is described in yarp::os::Bottle ()
/superquadric-grasp-demo/superq:rpc [rpc-client]:
Interact with the superquadric-model module.
. This service is described in yarp::os::Bottle ()
/superquadric-grasp-demo/grasp:rpc [rpc-client]:
Interact with the superquadric-grasp module.
. This service is described in yarp::os::Bottle ()
